# Making a function to lemmatize all the words
lemmatizer = WordNetLemmatizer() 
def lemmatize_all(data,name):
    arr=data[name]
    a=[]
    for i in arr:
        b=[]
        for j in i:
            x=lemmatizer.lemmatize(j,pos='a')
            x=lemmatizer.lemmatize(x)
            b.append(x)
        a.append(b)
    data[name]=a
